General.Name: Western Superconducting Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Western Superconducting Technologies Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production and, sale of high-end titanium alloy materials, superconducting materials, and high-performance superalloy materials and their applications in China and internationally. The company offers superconducting materials, such as NbTi, Nb3Sn, and MgB2. It also provides titanium alloy materials, such as large rods, small bars, wires, etc. The company serves aerospace, medical, automotive, energy, information, environmental protection, transportation, and other industries. Western Superconducting Technologies Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Xi'an, China.
General.Address: No.12, Ming Guang Road, Xi'an, China, 710018
